questions: Can you provide specific examples of projects you have worked on within the Information Technology industry during your 1.3 years of experience?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in the Information Technology field?
What technical skills do you possess that make you a valuable asset in the IT industry?
Can you discuss a challenging situation you encountered in your IT role and how you successfully resolved it?
How do you prioritize and manage your tasks to ensure efficient workflow in a fast-paced IT environment?
Have you ever collaborated with cross-functional teams or departments to achieve a common IT goal? If so, please provide details
How do you handle troubleshooting and problem-solving in IT-related issues?
What motivated you to pursue a career in Information Technology, and how has your passion for the field evolved over time?
Can you discuss a time when you had to adapt to new technologies or software quickly, and how you managed the learning curve?
How do you ensure the security and confidentiality of sensitive information while working in the IT industry?
